Represents a set of source data for a Tabletop Role-Playing Game (TTRPG) system.

Properties

ImportLimit

Gets or sets the limit on the number of items to import into the compendium from the data source. Generally this is only used for testing purposes to limit the size of the generated compendiums.

public int? ImportLimit { get; set; }

Property Value

int?

Labels

Gets or sets a list of default labels to apply to all entries imported from this data source.

public List<string> Labels { get; set; }

Property Value

List<string>

LicenseDataParser

Gets or sets the name of the parser to use for deserializing license data.

public string LicenseDataParser { get; set; }

Property Value

string

LicenseDataURI

Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) where the license data for the game source data is located.

public string LicenseDataURI { get; set; }

Property Value

string

OverwriteExisting

Gets or sets a value indicating whether new data should be downloaded to replace existing data.

public bool OverwriteExisting { get; set; }

Property Value

bool

SourceDataSetName

Gets or sets the name of the source data set. This is primarily used for identification purposes.

public string SourceDataSetName { get; set; }

Property Value

string

SourceDataSetParser

Gets or sets the name of the parser to use for deserializing source data.

public string SourceDataSetParser { get; set; }

Property Value

string

SourceDataSetURI

Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) where the actual game source data is located.

public string SourceDataSetURI { get; set; }

Property Value

string

Substitutions

Gets or sets the list of XPath/HTML susbstitutions to use with for this data source.

public List<Substitution> Substitutions { get; set; }

Property Value

List<Substitution>

TagSymbol

Gets or sets the tag entry to use for campaign entries derived from this source.

public string TagSymbol { get; set; }

Property Value

string

TagValuePrefix

Gets or sets the tag value prefix for this game component.

public string? TagValuePrefix { get; set; }

Property Value

string

XPath

Gets or sets the XPath of the starting element in the data set.

public string? XPath { get; set; }
